name: Trial of Chains (Puzzle)
description:
Hi there!

This is my personal project, Trial of Chains (Puzzle), done in GAME 712 - Gameplay Scripting at SCAD. Over the past 10 weeks, it's been iterated from the concept to the executable using UE4.

My focuses of this project are:

- Game Design & Programming
- Turn-based Chain Effect
- Reusable Gameplay Kit
- Square Grids of Board (Referencing and Pathing)
- Level Design
- Progression of Difficulty (as Tutorial)
- User Interface Implementation

Credits:

Assets of models, VFX, audios, graphics are from Unreal marketplace. Some of them are modified to fit the game.
